verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Esau,<WH6215> who<WH1931> is Edom.<WH123>

Esau<WH6215> took<WH3947> his wives<WH802> of the daughters<WH1323> of Canaan;<WH3667> Adah<WH5711> the daughter<WH1323> of Elon<WH356> the Hittite,<WH2850> and Aholibamah<WH173> the daughter<WH1323> of Anah<WH6034> the daughter<WH1323> of Zibeon<WH6649> the Hivite;<WH2340>
And Bashemath<WH1315> Ishmael's<WH3458> daughter,<WH1323> sister<WH269> of Nebajoth.<WH5032>
And Adah<WH5711> bore<WH3205> to Esau<WH6215> Eliphaz;<WH464> and Bashemath<WH1315> bore<WH3205> Reuel;<WH7467>

And Aholibamah<WH173> bore<WH3205> Jeush,<WH3266> and Jaalam,<WH3281> and Korah:<WH7141> these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> which<WH834> were born<WH3205> to him in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>

And Esau<WH6215> took<WH3947> his wives,<WH802> and his sons,<WH1121> and his daughters,<WH1323> and all<WH3605> the persons<WH5315> of his house,<WH1004> and his cattle,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> his beasts,<WH929> and all<WH3605> his substance,<WH7075> which<WH834> he had got<WH7408> in the land<WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667> and went<WH3212> into<WH413> the country<WH776> from the face<WH6440> of his brother<WH251> Jacob.<WH3290>

For their riches<WH7399> were more<WH7227> than that they might dwell<WH3427> together;<WH3162> and the land<WH776> wherein they were strangers<WH4033> could<WH3201> not bear<WH5375> them because<WH6440> of their cattle.<WH4735>
Thus dwelled<WH3427> Esau<WH6215> in mount<WH2022> Seir:<WH8165> Esau<WH6215> is Edom.<WH123>
And these<WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Esau<WH6215> the father<WH1> of the Edomites<WH130> in mount<WH2022> Seir:<WH8165>

These<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of Esau's<WH6215> sons;<WH1121> Eliphaz<WH464> the son<WH1121> of Adah<WH5711> the wife<WH802> of Esau,<WH6215> Reuel<WH7467> the son<WH1121> of Bashemath<WH1315> the wife<WH802> of Esau.<WH6215>
And the sons<WH1121> of Eliphaz<WH464> were Teman,<WH8487> Omar,<WH201> Zepho,<WH6825> and Gatam,<WH1609> and Kenaz.<WH7073>

And Timna<WH8555> was concubine<WH6370> to Eliphaz<WH464> Esau's<WH6215> son;<WH1121> and she bore<WH3205> to Eliphaz<WH464> Amalek:<WH6002> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Adah<WH5711> Esau's<WH6215> wife.<WH802>

And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Reuel;<WH7467> Nahath,<WH5184> and Zerah,<WH2226> Shammah,<WH8048> and Mizzah:<WH4199> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Bashemath<WH1315> Esau's<WH6215> wife.<WH802>

And these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Aholibamah,<WH173> the daughter<WH1323> of Anah<WH6034> the daughter<WH1323> of Zibeon,<WH6649> Esau's<WH6215> wife:<WH802> and she bore<WH3205> to Esau<WH6215> Jeush,<WH3266> and Jaalam,<WH3281> and Korah.<WH7141>

These<WH428> were dukes<WH441> of the sons<WH1121> of Esau:<WH6215> the sons<WH1121> of Eliphaz<WH464> the firstborn<WH1060> son of Esau;<WH6215> duke<WH441> Teman,<WH8487> duke<WH441> Omar,<WH201> duke<WH441> Zepho,<WH6825> duke<WH441> Kenaz,<WH7073>

Duke<WH441> Korah,<WH7141> duke<WH441> Gatam,<WH1609> and duke<WH441> Amalek:<WH6002> these<WH428> are the dukes<WH441> that came of Eliphaz<WH464> in the land<WH776> of Edom;<WH123> these<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Adah.<WH5711>

And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Reuel<WH7467> Esau's<WH6215> son;<WH1121> duke<WH441> Nahath,<WH5184> duke<WH441> Zerah,<WH2226> duke<WH441> Shammah,<WH8048> duke<WH441> Mizzah:<WH4199> these<WH428> are the dukes<WH441> that came of Reuel<WH7467> in the land<WH776> of Edom;<WH123> these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Bashemath<WH1315> Esau's<WH6215> wife.<WH802>

And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Aholibamah<WH173> Esau's<WH6215> wife;<WH802> duke<WH441> Jeush,<WH3266> duke<WH441> Jaalam,<WH3281> duke<WH441> Korah:<WH7141> these<WH428> were the dukes<WH441> that came of Aholibamah<WH173> the daughter<WH1323> of Anah,<WH6034> Esau's<WH6215> wife.<WH802>
These<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Esau,<WH6215> who is Edom,<WH123> and these<WH428> are their dukes.<WH441>
These<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Seir<WH8165> the Horite,<WH2752> who inhabited<WH3427> the land;<WH776> Lotan,<WH3877> and Shobal,<WH7732> and Zibeon,<WH6649> and Anah,<WH6034>
And Dishon,<WH1787> and Ezer,<WH687> and Dishan:<WH1789> these<WH428> are the dukes<WH441> of the Horites,<WH2752> the children<WH1121> of Seir<WH8165> in the land<WH776> of Edom.<WH123>
And the children<WH1121> of Lotan<WH3877> were Hori<WH2753> and Hemam;<WH1967> and Lotan's<WH3877> sister<WH269> was Timna.<WH8555>
And the children<WH1121> of Shobal<WH7732> were these;<WH428> Alvan,<WH5935> and Manahath,<WH4506> and Ebal,<WH5858> Shepho,<WH8195> and Onam.<WH208>

And these<WH428> are the children<WH1121> of Zibeon;<WH6649> both Ajah,<WH345> and Anah:<WH6034> this<WH1931> was that Anah<WH6034> that found<WH4672> the mules<WH3222> in the wilderness,<WH4057> as he fed<WH7462> the asses<WH2543> of Zibeon<WH6649> his father.<WH1>
And the children<WH1121> of Anah<WH6034> were these;<WH428> Dishon,<WH1787> and Aholibamah<WH173> the daughter<WH1323> of Anah.<WH6034>
And these<WH428> are the children<WH1121> of Dishon;<WH1787> Hemdan,<WH2533> and Eshban,<WH790> and Ithran,<WH3506> and Cheran.<WH3763>
The children<WH1121> of Ezer<WH687> are these;<WH428> Bilhan,<WH1092> and Zaavan,<WH2190> and Akan.<WH6130>
The children<WH1121> of Dishan<WH1789> are these;<WH428> Uz,<WH5780> and Aran.<WH765>
These<WH428> are the dukes<WH441> that came of the Horites;<WH2752> duke<WH441> Lotan,<WH3877> duke<WH441> Shobal,<WH7732> duke<WH441> Zibeon,<WH6649> duke<WH441> Anah,<WH6034>

Duke<WH441> Dishon,<WH1787> duke<WH441> Ezer,<WH687> duke<WH441> Dishan:<WH1789> these<WH428> are the dukes<WH441> that came of Hori,<WH2753> among their dukes<WH441> in the land<WH776> of Seir.<WH8165>
And these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> that reigned<WH4427> in the land<WH776> of Edom,<WH123> before<WH6440> there reigned<WH4427> any king<WH4428> over the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And Bela<WH1106> the son<WH1121> of Beor<WH1160> reigned<WH4427> in Edom:<WH123> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Dinhabah.<WH1838>
And Bela<WH1106> died,<WH4191> and Jobab<WH3103> the son<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> of Bozrah<WH1224> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>
And Jobab<WH3103> died,<WH4191> and Husham<WH2367> of the land<WH776> of Temani<WH8489> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>

And Husham<WH2367> died,<WH4191> and Hadad<WH1908> the son<WH1121> of Bedad,<WH911> who smote<WH5221> Midian<WH4080> in the field<WH7704> of Moab,<WH4124> reigned<WH4427> in his stead:<WH8478> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Avith.<WH5762>
And Hadad<WH1908> died,<WH4191> and Samlah<WH8072> of Masrekah<WH4957> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>
And Samlah<WH8072> died,<WH4191> and Saul<WH7586> of Rehoboth<WH7344> by the river<WH5104> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>
And Saul<WH7586> died,<WH4191> and Baalhanan<WH1177> the son<WH1121> of Achbor<WH5907> reigned<WH4427> in his stead.<WH8478>

And Baalhanan<WH1177> the son<WH1121> of Achbor<WH5907> died,<WH4191> and Hadar<WH1924> reigned<WH4427> in his stead:<WH8478> and the name<WH8034> of his city<WH5892> was Pau;<WH6464> and his wife's<WH802> name<WH8034> was Mehetabel,<WH4105> the daughter<WH1323> of Matred,<WH4308> the daughter<WH1323> of Mezahab.<WH4314>

And these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of the dukes<WH441> that came of Esau,<WH6215> according to their families,<WH4940> after their places,<WH4725> by their names;<WH8034> duke<WH441> Timnah,<WH8555> duke<WH441> Alvah,<WH5933> duke<WH441> Jetheth,<WH3509>
Duke<WH441> Aholibamah,<WH173> duke<WH441> Elah,<WH425> duke<WH441> Pinon,<WH6373>
Duke<WH441> Kenaz,<WH7073> duke<WH441> Teman,<WH8487> duke<WH441> Mibzar,<WH4014>

Duke<WH441> Magdiel,<WH4025> duke<WH441> Iram:<WH5902> these<WH428> be the dukes<WH441> of Edom,<WH123> according to their habitations<WH4186> in the land<WH776> of their possession:<WH272> he is Esau<WH6215> the father<WH1> of the Edomites.<WH130>
